Corn oil and its effects on breast cancer

  • Substituting canola oil for corn oil is an easy dietary change for people to make; such a change to the maternal diet may decrease risk for breast cancer in the daughter.
    • Link to article
    • Citation:
        • BMC Cancer. Published 2010-03-06.
  • The high-corn-oil diet strongly stimulates mammary tumorigenesis in association with modifications in the expression profile and an increased proliferation/apoptosis balance of the mammary gland.
    • Link to article
    • Citation:
        • European Journal of Nutrition. Published 2015/06/20.
